name: BEEKEEPER BOP
description:
This was a game developed in around a 72 hour time frame for the ScoreSpace Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/scorejam-8bti-arcade-controls), with the theme being swarm. With this being my first Game Jam, I decided to go with a simple idea and just see what I could learn, as I want to get better at Game Dev. I learned quite alot, and also reiterated stuff I already knew, which is how I learn properly. 

The game is a very simple concept. You play as a swarm of bees and you have to attack the evil beekeepers who are coming to destroy you.

Be sure to let me know of any feedback or suggestions you have for the game.

Links to all assets used:

https://nimblebeastscollective.itch.io/magosfonts

https://opengameart.org/content/zelda-like-tilesets-and-sprites

https://superdark.itch.io/enchanted-forest-characters
